responsibilities: Managed day-to-day execution of social media campaigns across Instagram, LinkedIn, and Twitter, resulting in a 12% increase in organic reach.
Monitored marketing KPIs and prepared monthly reports for senior leadership using Google Analytics.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to update website copy and promotional blog content for seasonal product launches.
Supported the lead strategist in performing competitive market analysis and keyword research for SEO optimization.
Drafted copy for weekly email newsletters and managed subscriber lists via Mailchimp.
Assisted in the organization and promotion of virtual industry networking events.
